content.question: At time <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, a projectile is launched from the top of a cliff at an angle of <math alttext="30 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>30</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> degrees below the horizontal. Which of the following pairs of graphs best represents the horizontal displacement <math alttext="delta x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Î”</mi><mtext></mtext><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and the vertical velocity component <math alttext="v sub vertical" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>vert</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> of the projectile as a function of time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
